description: MAD Sandwiches brings authentic Mexican cooking to Italian style sandwiches. The combination of the two worlds is without a doubt a mad mixture of flavors perfectly serve in a fresh Italian bun. A family oriented mobile kitchen in Harrisburg, Pennsylvania is definitely has been making their way up in the food truck scene with sandwiches like no other. For example, the "Cuban Sandwich" is like no other, and has become a best seller. Next time you get hungry just get Mad!
name: MAD Sandwiches
